Load packages and datasets.

```{r packages}
if (!require(tidyverse)) {install.packages("tidyverse"); library(tidyverse)}
#if (!require(biomaRt)) {biocLite("biomaRt"); library(biomaRt)} # Ensembl biomaRt to obtain C. elegans sequences.
```

Obtain the 500 bp upstream, and 100 bp downstream, promoter regions of all the protein-coding genes in the C. elegans genome. The data was originally downloaded using the script `2.0-Celegans-promoters-BioMaRt.R`.
```{r load-promoters}
load("data/Celegans-promoters.rdata")
```
